comment: I thought he was a great person and great teacher. He is new so of course he has some things to improve but I liked him a lot. Very helpful and cares about you and your grade if you do. He will do anything really to help you, yo u just have to ask! Great class, deff take him for any chemistry

Wonderful person. Got all easy As in his class. Just read the chapters before you go to class and you will not fail to get an A. I wonder how some of these students expected him to teach? His tests were very easy. Take him for sure!If you want free points. He gave all of us an extra free 17points on the final so everyone made their grade.

Frustrating. As a person, I like him. As a teacher? Wish I'd had someone else. 1st semester teaching. Had a lot of material to cover, but his attitude was "if it doesn't apply to nursing, I'm not covering it". With a state-standardized chem final, I certainly don't get to pick what questions I answer - why does he get to pick what to teach?

Great class & I liked him a lot! Like they said it was his first year and he got side tract at times but he also seemed way more helpful than any of the other teachers and as long as you go to class and take notes/read your book you can easily get an A.

I think he is a great teacher overall. This was his first semester here as a teacher so he got mixed up at times but he always had an answer for questions asked. Read the chapter prior to going to class and you will be just fine. I got all A's in his class!! Homework only graded on completion.
He's very surface...he needs to dig a little deeper. He needs to get a little more experience behind him. Be prepared to go home and teach yourself basicly.
